name: Butterfly Mandolin
loreDescription: A mandolin used by Ludo, a pure-voiced minstrel. If you play it, you can see an illusion of butterflies made of light dancing.

skillDescription.base: 4.0% chance to be granted an extra turn at the end of the next turn when attacked.
skillDescription.max: 8.0% chance to be granted an extra turn at the end of the next turn when attacked.
